remarks: Equality of sequences.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:
seqfveq2.1 $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
seqfveq2.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( .+ , F ) ` K ) = ( G ` K ) ) $.
seqfveq2.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` K ) ) $.
seqfveq2.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( ( K + 1 ) ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) = ( G ` k ) ) $.
seqfveq2 $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( .+ , F ) ` N ) = ( seq K ( .+ , G ) ` N ) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d K k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
